Text:
PQ is awesome. Played fine on my machine but no audio subtitles found.

Burned the video to disk and played on the PS3, until about 20 mins in then it muted the sound and a message popped up on the screen saying something like "Audio Outputs temporarily muted....message Code 3....reference to Cinavia website."

Not sure how to get around this. Maybe encoding to a different output and re-burn?
